# Overview 

This is following [this tutorial](https://rpubs.com/jensroes/mixture-models-tutorial) on fitting log-Gaussian mixed-effects mixture models to get familiar with the syntax in stan and `brms`. 

```{r}
#| output: false 
library(rstan)
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
```
